review_text: Nathan's Place was the perfect location for our weekend in Oxford attending the LSU-Ole Miss football game. The condo is an easy 30 min. walk to The Grove and a shorter walk to the football/ baseball stadiums. The walk is along sidewalks and beautiful once you enter the campus. 30 minutes was comparable to any of the public parking lots without the hassle of driving. The condo is also an easy 10-15 minute drive to the Square. The apartment is as pictured with a spacious living/dining area. The dining table is set for 4 but easily accommodated 6. The kitchen is well stocked with utensils, plates, and glasses. The refrigerator is full sized. We did not cook but used the full sized stove to heat food we brought in. The peninsula provided plenty of space to lay out multiple dishes. The beds were comfortable. The bathrooms were small but perfectly adequate. Someone was in touch daily to see if we needed anything. It was nice to sit outside on the patio. We would return here.
